quoteText:
If you do not wish to receive ads targeted to your interests from Apple's advertising platform, you can choose to enable Limit Ad Tracking, which will opt your Apple ID out of receiving such ads regardless of what device you are using.
If you enable Limit AdTracking on your mobile device, third-party apps cannot use the Advertising Identifier, a non-personal device identifier, to serve you targeted ads.
title: Apple provides an opt-out method for Apple targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising
tosdr.tldr: Apple provides an opt-out method for Apple targeted advertising
